encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

bibl.title: Literary and Non-Literary Papyri from the University of Michigan Collection.
bibl.note: Diss. Univ. of Michigan. Summary in DA 49 (1988-1989) p. 1136-A. - 14 papyri: 10 literary texts (Iliad, Demosthenes, Isocrates, "scholia minora" to the Iliad", multiplication table, Euripides), 1 Christian fragment (Luke 2.1-7) and 3 documentary papyri from the Ptolemaic period.
